item.description:
This looks silly and zany and has a great cast.Â  :)

7:20 Showtime, I will be at the theater by 6:15 and we will head in for seats at 6:55.

The movie is showing upstairs so look for the group at the tables at the top of the escalators by the big windows.

As I like to see these movies during opening weekend, it is usually a good idea to buy your tickets ahead of time....especially if it is a big movie with lots of buzz.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

$$$$Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after.$$$$$

Movie Details:

Release Date: October 12, 2012
Studio: CBS Films
Director: Martin McDonagh
Screenwriter: Martin McDonagh
Starring: Colin Farrell, Christopher Walken, Sam Rockwell, Woody Harrelson, Abbie Cornish, Tom Waits, Olga Kurylenko, Zeljko Ivanek
Genre: Comedy
MPAA Rating: R (for strong violence, bloody images, pervasive language, sexuality/nudity and some drug use)
Official Website: SevenPsychopaths.com | Facebook | Twitter
Review: Not Available
DVD Review: Not Available
DVD: Not Available
Movie Poster: One-Sheet | Olga Kurylenko Poster | Christopher Walken Poster | Colin Farrell Poster | Sam Rockwell Poster | Abbie Cornish Poster | Tom Waits Poster | Woody Harrelson Poster
Production Stills: View here

Plot Summary: Written and Directed by Oscar-winner Martin McDonagh , the comedy "Seven Psychopaths" follows a struggling screenwriter (Colin Farrell) who inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends (Christopher Walken and Sam Rockwell) kidnap a gangster's (Woody Harrelson) beloved Shih Tzu.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: Seven Psychopaths (7:20PM Show)
